long_description: With race-ready features for high-performance riders, the Cannondale CAAD10 3 Compact road bike boasts responsive handling, Shimano Ultegra components and a lightweight aluminum frame. 6069 aluminum CAAD10 frame offers responsive stiffness with impressive weight savings that rivals some carbon frames. Butted and shaped seatstays and chainstays help reduce side-to-side flex for energy efficiency while also helping make bumps and road vibrations less jarring. Lightweight all-carbon fork supplies great road performance, slicing through corners and damping road vibrations; tapered steerer enhances stiffness and responsiveness. Shimano Ultegra derailleurs and shifters offer precise, dependable shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. Compact FSA SL-K Light Carbon crankset is paired with a 11-25 tooth cassette for a capable gear range; BB30 bottom bracket enhances stiffness for more efficient power transfer. Mavic Aksium wheelset is decked out with fast Mavic Aksion tires for excellent handling and speed. Pedals sold separately. Cannondale CAAD10 3 bike specs are subject to change.
